title: Remove EndorsementCard from profile page
description:
Edit `src/frontend/src/app/profile/[username]/page.tsx` to remove:
1. The import of `EndorsementCard`
2. The endorsements section from the JSX that renders endorsement cards
Ensure the profile page renders correctly without the endorsement section.
acceptance_criteria:
- No `EndorsementCard` import in page.tsx
- No endorsements section in the JSX
- Profile page renders without errors
- `npx tsc --noEmit` passes
- Profile page UI looks correct without endorsement section
